law.catch_line: An individual, group, or blanket health insurance policy:...
law.text:
An individual, group, or blanket health insurance policy:
may not be denied by an insurer or nonprofit health service plan solely because the insured has had a breast implant; and
on renewal, may not impose a waiting period or exclusion for a preexisting condition that limits or excludes coverage solely because the insured has had a breast implant.
